Shine 0.2.6

Heatmap_Shine

Heatmap_Shine.Rd

a function can generate heatmap

Heatmap_Shine(
  colour = c("green", "black", "red"),
  a = -2,
  b = 2,
  d = 100,
  scale_row = TRUE,
  size_row = 10,
  size_col = 8,
  fontsize = 10,
  ppt_height = 7,
  ppt_width = 9,
  cellwidth = NA,
  cellheight = NA,
  border = NA,
  show_colnames = FALSE,
  show_rownames = FALSE,
  cluster_cols = FALSE,
  group = c("case", "control")
)

Arguments

colour

colour selection.
a

lowerlimt of colour.
b

toplimit of colour
d

default 100
scale_row

scale or not
size_row

the font size of row
size_col

the font size of col
fontsize

the font size
ppt_height

ppt_height.
ppt_width

ppt_width
cellwidth

cellwidth
cellheight

cellheight
border

show boder or not
show_colnames

show_colnames
show_rownames

show_rownames
cluster_cols

default is FALSE
group

group info.

Value

All the results can be got form other functions and instruction.

Examples

# \donttest{
##---- Be sure the format of data and sample.info is correct!! ----
# }
